mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_table(postTitle, postWriter, postContent) VALUE(#{postTitle}, #{postWriter}, #{postContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_table SET postTitle=#{postTitle}, postWriter=#{postWriter}, postContent=#{postContent} WHERE postNum=#{postNum}
